embeds.title: Mallet
embeds.description:
Rare Relic / The Automaton / Downfall

At the start of each combat, add 2 copies of Fine Tuning+ to your hand.
*That's it! I'm gettin me mallet!*

messages.content: loved this
so easy to make really strong functions when you have increased numbers on demand, twice
lot of stuff has multiple numbers on it to get bonus benefits
or just lol i sure do enjoy my 4 draw 3 energy non exhausting function that also does another thing
fine tuning+ is insanely good
and this relic says "get 2 innate fine tuning+ that don't take up draw"
how can it be bad

Very deserving of being a rare relic, feels somewhat similar to bag of preparation, but has a ton of utility and offers late game scaling as well as better frontloading. You can wait to use the fine tunings until the best possible moment, and there are plenty of encode cards that have several numbers that benefit from the increase (goto, iterate, philosophize, fragment, blockchain, etc.) You are thrilled to see this basically every time on automaton, and It's definitely a high priority buy from a shop. You can make it better by trying to get those specific cards that synergize with it, but even without them, the scaling and frontloading this provides is already fantastic, even on the cards that only have 1 number to increase.
<terminator> moment

embeds.title: Terminator
embeds.description:
Uncommon Skill / 1 (0) :energy_auto: / The Automaton / Downfall

**Encode.**
**Compile** - If this is the last card of the Function, it gains 'Play this again'.

messages.content: You could do even more with this relic in combination with <electromagnetic coil>

embeds.title: Electromagnetic Coil
embeds.description:
Boss Relic / The Automaton / Downfall

Functions are now made up of 4 cards.
*An inefficient but entertaining power source.*

messages.content: coil is usually pretty bad tho
<ancient writing> can make it more viable by reducing your non encode cards

embeds.title: Ancient Writing
embeds.description:
Event / Act 2 / All / Slay the Spire
```ansi
[2;37m[Elegance[2;37m] [2;32mRemove a card from your deck.
``````ansi
[2;37m[Simplicity[2;37m] [2;32mUpgrade all Strikes and Defends.
``````ansi
[2;37m[Unification [0;2m(automaton only)[2;37m] All [2;32mStrikes [0;2mand [2;32mDefends [0;2mgain [2;32mEncode.
``````ansi
[2;37m[Intuition [0;2m(champ only)[2;37m] [2;32mAdd [2;33m'trigger Skill Bonus.' [0;2mto all [2;32mStrikes [0;2mand [2;32mDefends.
``````ansi
[2;37m[Caprice [0;2m(gremlins only)[2;37m] [2;32mReplace [0;2mall [2;32mStrikes [0;2mand [2;32mDefends [0;2mwith [2;32mShivs [0;2mand [2;32mWards.
``````ansi
[2;37m[Endurance [0;2m(guardian only)[2;37m] [2;32mAdd Brace 2 [0;2mto all [2;32mStrikes [0;2mand [2;32mDefends.
``````ansi
[2;37m[Wistfulness [0;2m(hexaghost only)[2;37m] [2;32mAdd Ethereal [0;2mto all [2;32mStrikes [0;2mand [2;32mDefends.
``````ansi
[2;37m[Inspiration [0;2m(slime boss only)[2;37m] [2;32mAdd Command [0;2mto all [2;32mStrikes [0;2mand [2;32mDefends.
``````ansi
[2;37m[Improvisation [0;2m(snecko only)[2;37m] [2;32mReplace [0;2mall [2;32mStrikes [0;2mand [2;32mDefends [0;2mwith random [2;32mUnidentified [0;2mcards.
```
